statements: DELETE FROM DrugCombinationAnalysis WHERE drug_combination = 'DrugA + DrugB';
DELETE FROM DrugCombinationAnalysis WHERE patient_id = 100 AND drug_combination = 'DrugA, DrugB';
DELETE FROM DrugCombinationAnalysis WHERE drug_combination LIKE '%DrugC%' AND patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM OtherTable WHERE condition = 'XYZ' ORDER BY patient_id DESC);
DELETE FROM treatments WHERE patient_id = 3 AND drug_name = 'Aspirin';
DELETE FROM treatments WHERE patient_id = 1 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM patient_treatments WHERE patient_id = 101 AND treatment_id = 201
DELETE FROM patient_treatments WHERE treatment_id = 1 AND date_started < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Treatments WHERE patient_id = 100 AND drug_id = 200;
DELETE FROM TreatmentHistory WHERE side_effect_id = 500 AND duration > 7;
